import React, { useState } from 'react' const CreateResume = () => { const[resumeValues, setResumeValues] = useState({ firstName:'', middleName:'', lastName:'', emailId:'', contactNumber:'', address:'', city:'', state:'', pincode:'', nationality:'', heading:{ heading:'', summary:'' }, education:[{ course:'', college:'', board:'', percentage:'', yearOfPass:'' }], experience:[ { organisation:'', designation:'', from:'', to:'' } ], skills:[{ skillName:'' }]}) const handleAddEducation = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); resume = resumeValues; resume.education.push({ course:'', college:'', board:'', percentage:'', yearOfPass:'' }) setResumeValues(resume); } const handleAddExperience = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } const handleAddSkills = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (

) } export default CreateResume
